item.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Zombies - How To Unlock And Use Pack-a-Punch On Liberty Falls
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/call-of-duty-black-ops-6-zombies-how-to-unlock-and-use-pack-a-punch-on-liberty-falls/1100-6527380/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 brings the return of Treyarch's traditional, round-base Zombies. The best map for getting started, especially for beginners, is the Liberty Falls map. Here we'll explain how to gain access to the Pack-a-Punch machine, as well as the costs associated with those upgrades for your weapons.

How to find and unlock the Liberty Falls Pack-a-Punch

When starting a match on Liberty Falls, the Pack-a-Punch machine will be on the opposite end of the gas station rooftop where you'll spawn. This will take some time to earn enough points to access the area you need to go.

There's also more than one path you can take, with doors to unlock on the left and right side of your starting area, but we recommend choosing the right side. This will give you quicker access to the most essential perks of Juggernog and Quick Revive.

Unlock barrier 1:

Spend the 1,500 essence points needed to unlock the right-side barrier.

Unlock barrier 2:

Head behind Ollie's Comic Shop to unlock the second barrier needed. This is 1,750 essence points to unlock.

Unlock barrier 3:

Follow the street leading up the hill to the church. This will include a barrier for 2,000 essence points to unlock access to the church front and cemetery.

Unlock barrier 4:

The front entrance to the church is also locked, so it will cost you 2,250 essence points to open this final barrier to the church.

You can now enter and find the Pack-a-Punch machine at the back of the room.

It's also helpful to note that Black Ops 6 finally allows players to share the costs of opening doors. You can choose to pay a portion of the barrier costs, and other teammates can chip in as well.

Pack-a-Punch costs

Upgrading the power of your weapon with the Pack-a-Punch machine is a hefty price. There are three tiers of upgrades, which are priced as follows:

  • Tier 1 costs 5,000 essence points
  • Tier 2 costs 15,000 essence points
  • Tier 3 costs 30,000 essence points

Playing solo, you should be able to unlock access to Pack-a-Punch and get a tier-one upgrade by level 9.

Weapon rarity upgrades

Additionally, you can also upgrade your weapon's rarity by adding more attachments. This rarity upgrade is applied at any of the map's Arsenal machines. There's an Arsenal machine at the end of the street on the right side, which is just beyond where you open the first barrier. There's another Arsenal machine in the parking lot opposite the church.

Weapon rarity upgrades are paid for with the salvage currency dropped by fallen zombies. The costs are as follows:

  • 500 for Common (Green)
  • 1,000 for Rare (Blue)
  • 3,500 for Epic (Pink)
  • 8,500 for Legendary (Orange)

For more on Black Ops 6, make sure to check out all the details on how player progression and prestige work. We have a guide for unlocking all of Black Ops 6's Mastery camos.

We also recommended some settings to use for Black Ops 6, including best controller layouts, audio settings, and more.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Elden Ring Official Art Books Are B1G1 50% Off At Amazon - Get Both For Only $59
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/elden-ring-official-art-books-are-b1g1-50-off-at-amazon-get-both-for-only-59/1100-6527378/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The Lands Between is one of the largest and best-designed open worlds in games, so it's not surprising that Elden Ring's scenery fills the pages of not one, but two art books. Both Elden Ring Official Art Books are on sale for steep discounts at Amazon, and they are eligible for Amazon's buy one, get one 50% off book sale running through October 26, dropping the total price of both hardcovers to only $59, down from $120.

  • Add both Elden Ring Official Art Books to your cart. Total price at checkout = $58.91
    • Volume I -- $40.73 ($60)
    • Volume II --$36.36 ($60)

Several other books about From Software games are included in Amazon's B1G1 50% off promotion, including the Bloodborne Graphic Novel Box Set and Dark Souls: The Complete Graphic Novel Collection. You can get the Dark Souls and Bloodborne graphic novel collections for $42 total.

B1G1 50% Off From Software Books

  • Dark Souls: The Complete Graphic Novel Collection (Paperback) -- $26.34 ($35)
  • Bloodborne Graphic Novel Box Set (1-3) -- $29 ($50)
  • Bloodborne Graphic Novel Vol. 6: The Bleak Dominion (Paperback) -- $13.80 ($18)
  • Elden Ring: Official Art Book Volume I (Hardcover) -- $40.73 ($60)
  • Elden Ring: Official Art Book Volume II (Hardcover) --$36.36 ($60)
  • Dark Souls: Design Works (Hardcover) -- $28.60 ($40)

Elden Ring: Official Art Book Volume I is discounted to $40.73, while Volume II is available for $36.36. If you add both books to your cart, your total price will drop to only $59 at checkout. This means you're actually saving 50% off the total retail price of $120 ($60 per book), which is the best deal yet since the books were published by Udon Entertainment last year. Volume I clocks in at 432 pages, while Volume II is 384 pages.

The hardcover books feature eye-catching cover art and were translated from Japanese to English. Volume I is centered on the open world you traverse as well as the game's dungeons, characters, and armor. Meanwhile, Volume II covers the many enemies you come across on your journey and the huge variety of weapons and items. Both books contain concept art and commentary. Considering the vastness of the Lands Between, it's a pretty safe bet these art books will teach you something new about Elden Ring's world.

Speaking of learning about Elden Ring's world, the third volume in the Books of Knowledge series releases October 31. Published by Future Press, Volume 3 focuses on the massive Shadow of the Erdtree expansion that released earlier this year. The first two volumes in the series have been sold out pretty much all year, so fans will want to preorder Volume 3 ahead of its release.

Elden Ring Books of Knowledge Series

  • Elden Ring Official Strategy Guide Volume 3 (Hardcover) -- $35.30 ($45) | Releases October 31
  • Elden Ring Official Strategy Guide Volume 1 (Hardcover) -- Sold out (third-party listings)
  • Elden Ring Official Strategy Guide Volume 2 (Hardcover) -- Sold out (third-party listings)

Shadow of the Erdtree's 416-page strategy guide isn't the only From Software reference book published by Future Press this year. Bloodborne Complete Edition Guide released earlier this month. A 744-page behemoth of a book, this Bloodborne guide combines Future Press' Collector's Edition base game guide with The Old Hunters DLC guide to create a definitive, comprehensive reference and lore book. Earlier editions of the Bloodborne guides have been sold out for years, so if you missed out, now's your chance to add it to your shelf before it disappears again.

In April, Future Press released the Dark Souls Trilogy Compendium, a 480-page hardcover offering a deep dive into From Software's three Dark Souls games.

Elden Ring Manga at Amazon

Elden Ring also has an official comedy manga adaptation. You can pick up all four volumes at Amazon:

  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 1 (Paperback) -- $11.70 ($13)
  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 2 (Paperback) -- $13
  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 3 (Paperback) -- $12 ($13)
  • Elden Ring: The Road to the Erdtree Volume 4 (Paperback) -- $12.47 ($13)
  • Elden Ring Official Art Books Are B1G1 50% Off At Amazon - Get Both For Only $59
  • Best Horror Movie 4K Box Sets And Steelbook Deals At Amazon Ahead Of Halloween
  • Dune Limited-Time Amazon Deals - All 6 Dune Books For $38, 4K Box Set For Lowest Price Yet
  • + Show More More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Links (5)
  • Both Arcane: League Of Legends Steelbook Editions Get Big, Limited-Time Amazon Discounts
  • RetroRealms Special Edition Preorder Summons Michael Myers To Your House This Halloween
  • Elden Ring Books Of Knowledge Volume 3 Releases On Halloween, Preorders Discounted At Amazon
  • Amazon's New Full-Color Kindle Could Be A Game Changer For Comic Books
  • Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 Preorders - Bonuses, Game Pass Deals, Branded Gear, And More

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com

item.title: Level Up Your Gaming Life With One Move You Won’t Regret
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gamespot.com/articles/level-up-your-gaming-life-with-one-move-you-wont-regret/1100-6527375/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f

GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

If you’re a PC player looking to take your experience to the next level, it’s time to talk about PC Game Pass.

For just $13.95 a month, your PC Game Pass subscription opens the door to a massive library of high-quality games — including major day-one releases like Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024, and Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, as well as exclusive perks you won’t want to miss.

Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 needs no introduction, promising to deliver the intense gameplay and engaging narratives fans expect from this blockbuster franchise, making it a must-play for FPS enthusiasts.

Meanwhile, Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 is set to elevate your virtual flying experience with stunning graphics and realistic environments, perfect for aviation enthusiasts and cosy gamers.

For adventure lovers, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle offers an exciting ride that brings the beloved character back to life, allowing players to immerse themselves in new thrilling quests.

Your subscription also comes with EA Play, giving you access to a treasure trove of popular EA games and exclusive discounts — like 20% off select titles and 10% off add-ons, meaning more games for less cash, letting you expand your library without breaking the bank.

If you’re into League of Legends or Valorant, linking your Riot Games account to your PC Game Pass will unlock some awesome in-game rewards that can really boost your gameplay.

For League of Legends players, you’ll gain access to all of the game’s Champions right from the start. Valorant fans will benefit from unlocking Agents, which can enhance your team composition and strategy. You’ll also score XP boosts, allowing you to climb the ranks faster and unlock even more rewards.

If you're looking to level up your gaming setup, subscribing to PC Game Pass opens the door to an unparalleled library of games and exclusive benefits.

This is the upgrade you won’t want to miss--and certainly won't regret.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
